game.title: The Quest for El Dorado
game.objective: Uncover the lost treasure and restore it to its history
game.description:
You are quested to discover the fabled city of El Dorado, where untold riches lie hidden. 
        Success in this adventure brings not only wealth but also a test of courage and wisdom.
game.reward: Valuable artifacts, gold coins, and eternal recognition

task.objective: Acquire the ancient map from Prospero's library
task.description: To start your journey, seek out Prospero in his study. The map holds crucial clues to guide you through the jungle.

task.objective: Bypass the Guardian of the Hidden Cavern
task.description: After obtaining the map, you must sneak past the guardian at the entrance to the Cave of Wonders. Beware of their magical powers.
task.location: The Hidden Cavern Entrance, Edge of the Jungle

task.objective: Rescue the stolen treasure from the traps
task.description: The final challenge awaits inside the Chamber of the Lost Treasure. Beware of booby traps and solve the riddles to claim your prize.
task.location: The Chamber of the Lost Treasure, Uncharted Lands
